hero.title: Just keep building
hero.subtitle: Software Engineer & Entrepreneur building innovative solutions for the modern web

about.title: AGUSTIN
about.subtitle: Founding engineer with 8 years of expertise in software development and technical innovation.
about.content: At 23 years old, I'm currently leading product at Ventia, a rapidly expanding CRM & Sales Performance Management SaaS platform serving clients across Latin America. Passionate about building scalable software solutions, leading high-performing teams, and driving impactful business results through technology.

jobs.title: CTO & Founder
description: Founded and scaled Ventia from startup to an established company, achieving $360K ARR, with more than 30 clients.
Launched a comprehensive CRM and analytics platform tailored specifically for SMBs with consultive sales proeccess on the latam market.
Managed a technical team consisting of 3 developers and 1 UI/UX designer.
Developed and launched a complete React Native mobile application.
Participated in prestigious acceleration and immersion programs including Endeavor ScaleUp, Itaú Cubo, and Mana Tech Miami Immersion Program.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of work and personal projects I've built over the years.

list.name: Companion IA
list.description: Built a personal IA helper, which keeps track of my tasks and helps me respond/improve my work based on current task - Electron + Vite, Shadcn, Open AI API, Cursor.

list.description: Fashion product and design manager SaaS - Hired and managed developer to build the product and created the product specification and roadmap.

list.name: IA Customer analysis project
list.description: Prof of concept using GPT models with Microsoft Innovation IA Lab and Ventia.
